Package com.piotrzawada.BarberShopBookingSystem

Class BookingController

java.lang.Object
com.piotrzawada.BarberShopBookingSystem.Controllers.BookingController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/bookings") public class BookingController extends Object
Rest Controller for handles REST requests related to the Bookings.
Version:
0.3.0
Author:
Piotr Zawada

      Book visit in a Barber
      Parameters:
      userDetails - - represents the user who make the appointment
      localDateTime - - String value of date and time of appointment
      Returns:
      Response Entity with message and Http Status.

      Parameters:
      userDetails - represents the user who want to cancel appointment.

      Response Entity with message and Http Status.
